message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm only selling it to you because I really need to get rid of it, and I'm willing to let it go for a steal. If you don't buy it, I'll have to sell it to someone else for a much higher price.
I'm not interested in buying a product that's worth $120 to me for $100, even if you're trying to get rid of it. I'd rather wait for a chance to buy a high-quality product at the price you're asking.

I've had a change of heart. I'm willing to sell this product to you for $100, but I'll throw in a 10% discount on the next product I offer, if you buy this one. It's a great opportunity to get a good deal on a product that's still worth something to you.

I appreciate the discount offer, but I'm not interested in buying a product that's worth $120 to me for $100, even with a discount on the next one. I'll wait for a chance to buy a high-quality product at the price you're asking.

I've reconsidered the price of the last product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell this high-quality product to you for $110. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal on a high-quality product like this anywhere else.
I'll take it. $110 is still a good deal for a product worth $120 to me.
